did.unittitle: J. Walter Thompson Company. Burt Manning papers 1956-1988
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Founded in 1864, the J. Walter Thompson Company (JWT) is one of the oldest and largest enduring advertising agencies in the United States. Burt Manning was an advertising executive at JWT who served as Chief Creative Officer and Chairman/Chief Executive Officer (1987-1998). Collection spans the years 1956-1988 and includes correspondence, reports, policy manuals, presentations, speeches and other materials that document Manning's career as Creative Director and executive at JWT offices in Chicago and New York. Companies represented include American Advertising Federation, American Association of Advertising Agencies, Association of National Advertisers, Burger King, Ford, GTE Sprint, Institute of Life Insurance, Leo Burnett, Miller, Pepsi, Quaker Oats (Aunt Jemima, Ken-L-Ration, Puss 'n Boots), Schlitz, Scott Paper, Twentieth Century Fox and the U.S. Marine Corps. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
In addition, original audiovisual materials are closed to patron use. Research Services staff need to produce use copies before contents can be accessed.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48-hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], J. Walter Thompson Company. Burt Manning Papers, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The J. Walter Thompson Company. Burt Manning Papers were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 1993.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession 1993-0013 is described in this collection guide.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note

chronitem.event: Associate Creative Director, Leo Burnett; Later in year hired as Copy Supervisor, JWT Chicago. Credited with slogan for Schlitz: When You're Out of Schlitz, You're Out of Beer
Senior Vice President, Co-Creative Director, JWT Chicago
Creative Director, JWT New York; elected to Management Committee
Executive Vice President, Executive Creative Director, JWT New York; named Vice Chairman of JWT
Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, JWT USA
Resigned from JWT USA to become Partner and Chairman of the Executive Committee, Jordan Case Taylor & McGrath (renamed Jordan Manning Case Taylor & McGrath
Returned to JWT as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
Named AdWeek Executive of the Year
Chairman, American Association of Advertising Agencies; and Director of the Advertising Council
Elected to National Sales and Marketing Hall of Fame
Retired from JWT; named Chairman Emeritus; elected to Advertising Hall of Fame

bioghist.p: In addition, Burt Manning has served as a trustee for the New School for Social Research; Neuroscience Research Foundation; and the Museum of Television and Radio. He is past Director of the Advertising Education Foundation; the National Actors Theatre; Bob Hope Institute for Heart Research; the National Council for Depressive Illness; and the American Shakespeare Theater. He was a member of the Madison Council Chamber of Commerce. Manning holds an Honorary Doctorate in Fine Arts from the Pratt Institute.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection spans the years 1956-1988 and includes correspondence, reports, policy manuals, presentations, speeches and other materials that document Manning's career as Creative Director and executive at JWT offices in Chicago and New York. Companies represented include American Advertising Federation, American Association of Advertising Agencies, Association of National Advertisers, Burger King, Ford, GTE Sprint, Institute of Life Insurance, Leo Burnett, Miller, Pepsi, Quaker Oats (Aunt Jemima, Ken-L-Ration, Puss 'n Boots), Schlitz, Scott Paper, Twentieth Century Fox and the U.S. Marine Corps.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into six series: Account Files; Administrative Files; New Business Files; Writings and Speeches; Audiovisual Materials; and Oversize Materials.
